biography.es: Kim Nam-joon, conocido como RM, es el líder del grupo BTS. Nacido el 12 de septiembre de 1994 en Ilsan, Corea del Sur. Es un rapero talentoso y productor musical que ha contribuido significativamente al éxito global del grupo.
biography.en: Kim Nam-joon, known as RM, is the leader of the BTS group. Born on September 12, 1994 in Ilsan, South Korea. He is a talented rapper and music producer who has significantly contributed to the global success of the group.

biography.es: Kim Seok-jin, conocido como Jin, es el vocalista y visual de BTS. Nacido el 4 de diciembre de 1992 en Gwacheon, Corea del Sur. Es conocido por su sentido del humor y su amor por la cocina.
biography.en: Kim Seok-jin, known as Jin, is BTS's vocalist and visual. Born on December 4, 1992 in Gwacheon, South Korea. He is known for his sense of humor and his love for cooking.

biography.es: Min Yoon-gi, conocido como Suga, es el rapero principal de BTS. Nacido el 9 de marzo de 1993 en Daegu, Corea del Sur. Es un compositor prolífico y ha escrito muchas de las canciones exitosas del grupo.
biography.en: Min Yoon-gi, known as Suga, is BTS's lead rapper. Born on March 9, 1993 in Daegu, South Korea. He is a prolific songwriter and has written many of the group's hit songs.

biography.es: Jung Ho-seok, conocido como J-Hope, es el bailarín principal y rapero de BTS. Nacido el 18 de febrero de 1994 en Gwangju, Corea del Sur. Es conocido por sus coreografías innovadoras y su energía positiva.
biography.en: Jung Ho-seok, known as J-Hope, is BTS's main dancer and rapper. Born on February 18, 1994 in Gwangju, South Korea. He is known for his innovative choreography and positive energy.

biography.es: Park Ji-min, conocido como Jimin, es el bailarín principal y vocalista de BTS. Nacido el 13 de octubre de 1995 en Busan, Corea del Sur. Es reconocido por sus poderosas actuaciones en el escenario y su voz emotiva.
biography.en: Park Ji-min, known as Jimin, is BTS's main dancer and vocalist. Born on October 13, 1995 in Busan, South Korea. He is recognized for his powerful stage performances and emotional voice.

biography.es: Kim Tae-hyung, conocido como V, es el vocalista y bailarín de BTS. Nacido el 30 de diciembre de 1995 en Daegu, Corea del Sur. Es conocido por su voz profunda y su personalidad carismática.
biography.en: Kim Tae-hyung, known as V, is BTS's vocalist and dancer. Born on December 30, 1995 in Daegu, South Korea. He is known for his deep voice and charismatic personality.

biography.es: Jeon Jung-kook, conocido como Jungkook, es el vocalista principal, bailarín y centro de BTS. Nacido el 1 de septiembre de 1997 en Busan, Corea del Sur. Es el maknae del grupo y conocido por su versatilidad musical.
biography.en: Jeon Jung-kook, known as Jungkook, is BTS's main vocalist, dancer, and center. Born on September 1, 1997 in Busan, South Korea. He is the group's maknae and known for his musical versatility.
